title: Wargame.Red.Dragon.Update.v357.incl.DLC-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS

Wargame: Red Dragon - Update v357 incl. DLC

Release Date :  8/2014                         Protection : Steam
Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Strategy

For list of changes read included patchnotes.txt

- Extract
- Run setup.exe and install update to your gamedir
- Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
- Play

Notes: This patch requires: CODEX release of Wargame Red Dragon
This patch includes new DLC: The Millionth Mile

Use language.changer.exe to switch the game to desired language.

You might want to migrate saves from original release

go to: %InstallDir%SaveData and put saves to this place

C:Users%USERNAME%AppDataRoamingSteamCODEX251060remote

Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online

CODEX is currently looking for

nothing but competition

are you ready

LNKCPS  02/2014
